title: How to Destroy the World by Stefan Molyneux
description:
Destroying the world is actually lot easier than you might think â€“ you will have to be patient, of course, but remember this: evil delayed is evil denied, and it is well worth the wait.

To destroy the world, you need to do three things â€“ first: break the bond between husband and wife â€“ second: break the bond between parent and child â€“ and third: convince the population that they are helpless. 

----------------------------------------------------------------------------


With host Stefan Molyneux, topics range from politics to philosophy to science to economics to relationships - and how to achieve real freedom in your life today!

Powerful ideas for all lovers of personal and political freedom - Freedomain Radio is the largest and most popular philosophy show on the web, and was a Top 10 Finalist in the 2007, 2008 and 2009 Podcast Awards. Topics range from politics to philosophy to science to economics to relationships to atheism - and how to achieve real freedom in your life today. Passionate, articulate, funny and irreverent, Freedomain Radio shines a bold light on old topics, and invents a few new ones to boot!
